Name: Construct a building
Description:
- Click Buildings (press B) to open the building planner.
- Click an empty and unlocked tile to show available buildings.
- Select an appropriate choice and click Build to add it to the queue.

Name: Equip a station with a card
Description:
- In your station panel (bottom of map view) or in the station planner (B), click the cards tab.
- Select an empty slot .
- A list of owned cards that fit that slot is shown.
- Choose a card from the list to equip.

Name: Use a Build-R card
Description:
- Click the >>>  button on a building being constructed.
- Apply an accelerant to speed it up.

Name: Upgrade a building
Description:
- Click a building in the planner (press B).
- Click upgrade.

Name: Say hello!
Description: - Type something into the global chat channel.

Name: Start scheming
Description: - Send a private message to someone.

Name: Rename your station
Description: - Click your station name to give it a new name.

Name: Change Docking Restrictions
Description:
- Press 'F' for Logistics, click the Stations tab.
- In the Docking Permissions dropdown menu, change from 'Alliance members' to 'Only my fleets'.

Name: Change Tactics
Description:
- Click the 'Tactics' Tab on the bottom of the station panel.
- Select Pincer, Turtling or Flanking to change the station-wide tactics for fleets.

Name: Spy a station
Description:
- Right click stations you do not own and click the spy icon (binoculars) to spy them.
- If successful you will recieve a spy report of that station.

Name: Equip a fleet with a card
Description: - Press 'F' for Logistics, click a card slots to install Cards to your fleets.

Name: Raid an NPC station
Description:
- Right click another player or NPC station, click Attack and then select Raid.
- Click to select or deselect operating fleets to participate in the raid.

Name: Produce 5 Corvettes
Description:
- Click the Shipyard button on the main UI.
- Select Corvette and set the slider to 5 units.
- Click Produce Ships to add them to the queue.

Name: Create a Scout fleet
Description:
- Click the 'New Fleet' button on the station panel.
- Assign it to be a Scout fleet and click Create Scout Fleet.

Name: Produce 5 Scouts
Description:
- Click the Shipyard button on the main UI.
- Select Scout and set the slider to 5 units.
- Click Produce Ships to add them to the queue.

Name: Deploy a probe
Description:
- Right click any hex and select Explore > Scan to deploy a probe.
- Only scouts and recon fleets are capable of this movement.

Name: Discover a mission
Description:
- Press 'F2' to enter the Exploration view.
- Deploy a probe into the center-most of the yellow hexes which represent Mission Hints.

Name: Create a Patrol Ship fleet
Description:
- Click the 'New Fleet' button on the station panel.
- Assign it to be a Patrol Ship fleet and click Create Patrol Ship Fleet.

Name: Produce 5 Patrol Ships
Description:
- Click the Shipyard button on the main UI.
- Select Patrol Ship and set the slider to 5 units.
- Click Produce Ships to add them to the queue.

Name: Complete a mission
Description:
- Right click a discovered mission.
- Complete the requirements (firepower or scan strength, fleet type, escorts) and send the armada to bring back a mission cache.

Name: Create an Industrial fleet
Description:
- Click the 'New Fleet' button on the station panel.
- Assign it to be a Industrial fleet and click Create Industrial Fleet.

Name: Produce 2 Industrials
Description:
- Click the Shipyard button on the main UI.
- Select Industrial and set the slider to 2 units.
- Click Produce Ships to add them to the queue.

Name: Complete a level 1 event
Description:
- Press 'A' to view all Tasks then click the Events tab.
- Select the Level 1 events and click "Start Event".

Name: Build a Mining Facility
Description:
- Right click an empty hex within your claim radius.
- Select Outpost and the choose Mining Facility.
- Requires at least 1 Industrial fleet and enough resources and cargo capacity.

Name: Upgrade a Mining Facility
Description:
- Right click your Mining Facility outpost, click Outpost and then click Upgrade.
- Requires an industrial fleet with enough cargo capacity, resources and appropriate commodities.

Name: Create or join an alliance
Description:
- Press 'P' to view the Politics panels.
- Browse already created alliances in the Alliances tab, click the [. . .] button to apply for membership. 
- Alternatively create your own alliance in the My Alliance tab.

Name: Change View Mode
Description: - Use the F1, F2, F3 or F4 keys to switch your view mode to Standard, Exploration, Resource or Political respectively.

Name: Complete a Daily Challenge
Description:
- Press 'A' to view all Tasks then click the Daily Challenges tab. 
- You can re-roll challenges to acquire a higher tier and better cache.

Name: Open a Cache
Description:
- Press 'I' to view your Inventory then click the Caches tab. 
- All earned caches from Events, Missions and Daily Challenges will appear here for you to open.

Name: Break down a Card
Description:
- Press 'I' to view your Inventory then click the Cards tab. 
- Click on any card you currently own then click the Craft tab.
- Click breakdown card to convert it into credits.

Name: Use Enhanced Breakdown
Description:
- Press 'I' to view your Inventory then click the Cards tab. 
- Click on any card you currently own then click the Craft tab.
- Click the Bonus salvage button to toggle spending Command cards in the breakdown.
- This increases the credits earned by 50%.

Name: Craft a Card
Description:
- Press 'I' to view your Inventory then click the Cards tab. 
- Click "Show all Cards" and click a card  you wish to craft. 
- Under the Craft tab, click Craft card if you have enough credits.

Name: Claim a Login Reward
Description: - Press 'A' to view Tasks then click the Login Rewards tab and claim a login reward.

Name: Exchange Resources
Description:
- Press 'F' to view Logistics then click the Exchange tab.
- Exchange resources using the sliders here at a 4:1 ratio.

Name: Use a Broker
Description:
- Press 'F' to view Logistics then click the Exchange tab.
- Exchange resources using a broker at a 1:1 ratio.

Name: Upgrade a Station to Level 2
Description: - Acquire over 20 Influence in a Station to upgrade it to Level 2.

Name: Level Up
Description: - Complete Daily Challenges and construct buildings and outposts to gain experience towards leveling up.

Name: Reach Level 2
Description: - Complete Daily Challenges and construct buildings and outposts to gain experience towards leveling up.

Name: Reach Level 3
Description: - Complete Daily Challenges and construct buildings and outposts to gain experience towards leveling up.

Name: Reach Level 5

Name: Complete the Tutorial Achievements
Description: - Complete all the Achievements under the Tutorial category.

Name: Upgrade a Station to Level 3
Description: - Acquire over 60 influence in a Station to upgrade it to level 3.

Name: Upgrade a Station to Level 4
Description: - Acquire over 120 influence in a Station to upgrade it to level 4.

Name: Discover a Solar Flare
Description: - Have more than 1 Scan Strength on a star to detect when it has a Solar Flare event.

Name: Harvest a Solar Flare
Description:
- Right click an on-going Solar Flare event and harvest it with an Industrial Fleet.
- You will require Plasma Harvesting capabilities from a combination of Cards, Buildings and Policies.

Name: Reach Level 10
Description: - Complete Daily Challenges and construct buildings and outposts to gain experience towards leveling up.

Name: Build a Station
Description: - With an Industrial fleet and 10 Infrastructure Points, target any empty Hex to build a new Station.
